entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:50 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:50 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023
